Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ChartContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.ConfigurationOptionsContainer
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractConfigurationElement<IsDefaultPoint>
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Point
  • public class Point
extends AbstractConfigurationElement<IsDefaultPoint>
    Point elements are used to represent the points in a line chart or a bubble chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
